column5: I get a daily update on news on North Bay, an Ontario town, kinda interesting to see what's happening, even if we can't be that far north. A number of variable subject articles.https://mail.yahoo.com/d/folders/1/m..._diE_oYVVwVQ7F Bill
So in a Nutshell what did it say ? I was unable to click on it ?

Sorry, apparently it doesn't come across without being through email. Here's another shot at it, the particular one referenced had an interesting article on over the limit walleyes. They have a free subscription option for email. https://newsofthenorthbay.com/ Bill
Bill is this the link you were trying to make ? This is free news link. https://www.baytoday.ca/local-news/4...ations-3659840 My daughter is a nurse for North Bay hospital.
Yeah, there are some other interesting articles on a variety of subjects, just some glimpses of what's happenin' in one area in which we cannot get to! Bill
Bill, I follow news in Kenora Ontario at www.kenoraonline.com
